title: cuda (many versions): OverflowError: signed integer is greater than maximum on Ubuntu 20.04, 21.04
body:
Cannot install, at least,`cuda@10.1.243:11.3.1` due to `OverflowError: signed integer is greater than maximum`:

Using:
* `spack@develop` (a7b6149cc02713de55cb5719b9dab2dfc0476303 from `Tue Jun 29 00:33:35 2021 -0400`)
* Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 21.04
* GCC 9.3.0, GCC 10.3.0
* Python 3.8.5, Python 3.9.5

```
$> spack install cuda@11.3.1
...
==> Installing cuda-11.3.1-5japwam43c6ocqge56qnjgjs6c67spnb
==> Fetching https://cache.e4s.io/build_cache/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/cuda-11.3.1/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64-gcc-9.3.0-cuda-11.3.1-5japwam43c6ocqge56qnjgjs6c67spnb.spack
==> Error: Failed to install cuda due to OverflowError: signed integer is greater than maximum
==> Error: signed integer is greater than maximum
```
